a bit unbalanced for both killer and survivor side, killers can be toxic and camp you all the game,in the other hand survivors can bring purple flashlights and T bag you all the game using God tiles.
With that said, i love this game due to it's unique genre you can have a blast if you get used to it i definitely recommend it.

Спустя год решил изменить мнение на счет этой игры.
Раньше меня раздражали подобные игры,ибо я их воспринимал слишком серьезно.Теперь же повзрослев и поумнев,я принимаю такие игры,как способ порофлить с друзьями.Да,именно с друзьями,ибо лично мне в соло очень скучно.Вообщем игруха таки хорошая,поиграть с друзьями самое то!

Вот,что тут было написано 17 апреля 2020 года
Игруха неплохая.Здесь не будет каких-то минусов и плюсов.Вы и сами можете прочесть их ниже или выше моего отзыва.Я могу сказать только одно,игруха очень быстро надоедает.Особенно если вы очень бомбящий человек,как например я.Оценка 4.5 идиотских обнов из 0
Не игра, а гавно из жопы. Плохие сервера из-за которых ты отключаешься и получаешь бан на 5 часов. ужасная система рейтингов, в которой надо быть сверчеловеком и делать всё сразу
Игра клёвая.Одни баги убирают другие добавляют,а так хорошая игра что б поприседать перед маном,послепить его,а за буббу покемпить в подвале с инсидиусом.В общем советую

The devs don't know what they're doing. The game is getting worse and worse and they're doing nothing.

Balance?... Balance?..... BAAALLAAAAANCEE?!?

No balance. Only silence.

Also game is still buggy mess after years.

Update update: Look up #DeadbyBoycott to check why the current state of the game is NOT worth your money.
The servers have gone bad lately. The balancing has gone to crap. Even the newest map is still disabled, weeks after the new DLC release.

Update: Pros are still pros, Cons are still cons. The game is slowly getting better, it is at a point where I can confidently recommend it to others. It still needs more work, but the devs are slowly going in the right direction.
Hopeful for new changes and additions!

Pros:
-Good atmosphere
-Good gameplay idea

Cons:
-Absolutely broken matchmaking. I can't stress this enough. You're just starting? Sure, come play against the highest level players. Ranks mean absolutely nothing, because they aren't considered for matchmaking.
-Crappy online experience. Wanna play with friends? Wanna keep on restarting the game until it finally lets you all queue? Oh, but then it'll just be cancelled because someone failed to connect. Ooops!
Update that brings the worst UI change. Now it looks like mobile games
There are definitely balancing issues. Some killers are way too op, and some survivor abilities are too op when combined. However, the game is solid and very fun. This is a must have.

90% of survivors are toxic in this game, if you're the killer and you win they cry "OH you're a camper, ALL you do is tunnel, you run op perks" but as the killer if you lose;  "ez ez ez pz baby killer you suck". Survivors are constantly teabagging you, taunting you, body blocking so you can't hook their friends, then they're quick to bitch at you simply cause you downed them as they're trying to unhook their friends LITERALLY as you just hooked them, they don't give you a chance to walk away first, or if you saw them hiding by the hook you're about to use and consider that camping killer. I'm not going to pretend like i didn't see you? The same survivors that are crying about you running op perks are also using decisive strike and borrowed time. All in all, playing as a killer you wont have fun at higher ranks in this game.

its really fun playing especially with your friends and it also helps you to conquer your fear. Being calm in such situation is one of what i've learned in this game in order to figure things what to do next.
one of the most TOXIC communities you can imagine. incompetent developers, who don't even play their own game.
muito bom, muito bom e muito bom

Data: 27/04/2020

CONTRAS:
Servidores LIXO (literalmente impossível de se jogar sem ter problemas frequentes de desconexão, lag, partidas canceladas, e por último mas não menos irritante, os banimentos temporários continuos e crescentes que você leva devido aos problemas anteriores), lotado de bugs , jogabilidade desbalanceada (muito mais favorável para os sobreviventes), comunidade tóxica, mal otimizado (faz bons computadores pedirem arrego pra rodar numa qualidade gráfica minimamente descente), lobbys incrivelmente demorados, hitbox péssima, personagens bloqueados somente liberados mediante a compra, e muitos outros problemas menores que você notará jogando. 

PRÓS: 
Possui uma ideia de gameplay bacana, criativa e diferente do que está acostumado a ver, é divertido de se jogar com os amigos, possui personagens bem legais.

RESUMO: 
A ideia por trás do jogo é ótima, mas o jogo em si é péssimo! A empresa desenvolvedora desse jogo não tem o mínimo de respeito pelos seus jogadores! Ao invés de resolver os frequentes problemas citados acima preferem criar roupas e cosméticos para vender a um preço absurdo aos idiotas que compram.

Отличный Хоррор на равне с пятницой или даже лучше.
Как командная игра точно лучше!
uno de los mejores juegos de terror sin duda

JUEGO CULIAO MALO, SIEMPRE SE CAE UNO EN CADA PARTIDA NOS TOCA UN AFK O NOS BOTA EL JUEGO... JUEGO DE MIERDA LOCO, PAGARAS PARA PASAR UN MALO RATO, PARA ESO JUEGO LOL Y ERA... DEVELOPERS MEDIOCRES.

English translation for the above review:
Fucking bad game, there's always one AFK player each game or one that instant-disconnect. You will pay to experience a bad gameplay, if i will have to deal with this i'd rather play league of legends. Mediocre Developers.

------------> Edit after alot more hours of gameplay.
It's kinda hard to explain my feelings at this point, the game is really attractive for players but it kinda lacks alot of things:

1. At some points people can start abusing the x2 points and if the killer is a farmer he will let you farm if you let him farm just to get max-reward of x2 points, this is happening alot lately with the 104% cakes... It kinda kills the idea of the game, i wanted to get killed and i couldn't die because the killer was farming...

A few bugs around the corner: 104% cake sometimes gives you 0% and others way more than what it says ... 

Overall the game experience is getting better but it still laacks alot of things! i don't give up on this game i will continue playing on it cause its really fun and catching.

This game is fun and keeps you on the edge of your seat! I love playing as the survivor with my group of friends and alone! Certainly recommend if you like games that have a different game play each time but same objective. Keeps things alive!
It's all fun and games untill a 4 man swf who all swap to Neas with flashlights last second come along.
i like that i can play on my computer i hate that it has a lag in it
